title: Day 1
message: There is a famous Australian saying thats important to remember when you're trying to get anything done - we're not here to $^&* spiders.  But those spiders will keep coming, so see if you can avoid them in this handy game!

title: Day 2
message: Here's a cheeky little game I knocked up with my son to teach him some coding over breakfast when he wanted to add some interaction to his presentation on Greek Mythology! Can you escape the dreaded minotaur!

title: Day 3
message: Block breaker! A classic take on breakout for your mobile phone!

title: Day 4
message: Take the clouds and avoid the cows!

title: Day 5
message: Stack sats, avoid central bankers!

title: Day 6
message: Words!

title: Day 7
message: Stack Em. Stack high and make the word for a special surprise!

title: Day 8
message: Its getting cold out so go for a ski!

title: Day 9
message: See if you can get the sheep in the pen!

title: Day 10
message: Sats Snake! Rebooting a classic with an orange twist!

title: Day 11
message: Oh my, they're invaders from Space!

title: Day 12
message: In the age of AI we'll all be retired in a field! So why not get ahead of the game, just avoid the cows!

title: Day 13
message: Mine the corn, avoid the insects!

title: Day 14
message: Avoid the cars in a 3D frogger reboot.

title: Day 15
message: Find the words against the clock and beat your friends.

title: Day 16
message: Get back to the 80s and Derez your opponents in a Tron lightbike challenge!

title: Day 17
message: Time for the OG. PONG IT BABY!

title: Day 18
message: How far can you go? Flap your wings to get thorugh the gaps!

title: Day 19
message: We've got Cows. We;ve got Keys. It;s CowKey Kong!

title: Day 20
message: Warm hearth.

title: Day 21
message: Evergreen energy.

title: Day 22
message: Starry night.

title: Day 23
message: Almost there!

title: Day 24
message: Christmas Eve magic.

title: Day 25
message: Merry Christmas!
